stop words subtext: Fill in the field to change agency stop words
agency name subtext: Fill in the field to change agency name
notifications comments subtext: New comments and messages in your agency and posts by masters in your agency.
notifications events subtext: Information about new events and important updates to the existing ones: violations by time answering, violations by stop words and confirming payment.
notifications information subtext: Information about interesting events as well as important platform updates.
modal notifications title: Are you sure that you want to disable notifications?
modal notifications subtext: You wont receive any notifications about new events, violations or some agency messages. Are you sure?
necessary cookies subtext: We use necessary cookies to make our site work. You may disable these by changing your browser settings, but this may affect how the website functions.
analytical cookies subtext: We use analytics cookies that help us make improvements by measuring how you use the site and personalize the site for you. These will be set only if you accept.
